ezvcard.io.json

Class JCardModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.Module
      • com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.module.SimpleModule
        • ezvcard.io.json.JCardModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Versioned, Serializable

    public class JCardModule
extends com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.module.SimpleModule

    Module for jackson-databind that serializes and deserializes jCards.

    Example: 

     ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper();
 mapper.registerModule(new JCardModule());
 VCard result = mapper.readValue(..., VCard.class);
    Author:
    Buddy Gorven
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • JCardModule

        public JCardModule()
        Creates the module.

    • Method Detail

      • isAddProdId

        public boolean isAddProdId()
        Gets whether a ProductId property will be added to each serialized vCard that marks it as having been generated by this library.
        Returns:
        true if the property will be added, false if not (defaults to true)

      • setAddProdId

        public void setAddProdId(boolean addProdId)
        Sets whether to add a ProductId property to each serialized vCard that marks it as having been generated by this library.
        Parameters:
        addProdId - true to add the property, false not to (defaults to true)

      • isVersionStrict

        public boolean isVersionStrict()
        Gets whether properties that do not support jCard will be excluded from each serialized vCard. jCard only supports properties defined in the vCard version 4.0 specification.
        Returns:
        true if the properties will be excluded, false if not (defaults to true)

      • setVersionStrict

        public void setVersionStrict(boolean versionStrict)
        Sets whether properties that do not support jCard will be excluded from each serialized vCard. jCard only supports properties defined in the vCard version 4.0 specification.
        Parameters:
        versionStrict - true to exclude such properties, false not to (defaults to true)

      • registerScribe

        public void registerScribe(VCardPropertyScribe<? extends VCardProperty> scribe)

        Registers a property scribe. This is the same as calling:

        getScribeIndex().register(scribe)

        Parameters:
        scribe - the scribe to register

      • getScribeIndex

        public ScribeIndex getScribeIndex()
        Gets the scribe index used by the serializer and deserializer.
        Returns:
        the scribe index

      • setScribeIndex

        public void setScribeIndex(ScribeIndex index)
        Sets the scribe index for the serializer and deserializer to use.
        Parameters:
        index - the scribe index
